org.alljoyn.services.common

Interface ClientBase

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AboutClient, AboutIconClient
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AboutClientImpl, AboutIconClientImpl, ClientBaseImpl

    public interface ClientBase
    A base class for service clients.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Status connect()
      Start an AllJoyn session with the device.
      void disconnect()
      Stop the AllJoyn session with the device.
      String getPeerName()
      The peer device's bus name, as advertised by Announcements
      int getSessionId()
      The id of the open session with the peer device.
      short getVersion()
      Interface version
      void initBus(BusAttachment busAttachment)
      Initialize client by passing the BusAttachment
      boolean isConnected()
      Is there an open session with the device.

    • Method Detail

        Stop the AllJoyn session with the device.

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Is there an open session with the device.
        Returns:
        true if there is a session with the device.
